item.title: 317 need npc help plz fast ansver
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

[code]public void newNPC(int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int rangex1, int rangey1, int rangex2, int rangey2, int WalkingType, int HP, boolean Respawns)

	{
	// first, search for a free slot
	int slot = -1;
	for (int i = 1; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] == null) {
			slot = i;
			break;
		}
	}

	if(slot == -1) return;		// no free slot found
             if(HP <= 0) { // This will cause client crashes if we don't use this :) - xero
              HP = 3000;
            }
	NPC newNPC = new NPC(slot, npcType);
	newNPC.absX = x;
	newNPC.absY = y;
	newNPC.makeX = x;
	newNPC.makeY = y;
	newNPC.moverangeX1 = rangex1;
	newNPC.moverangeY1 = rangey1;
	newNPC.moverangeX2 = rangex2;
	newNPC.moverangeY2 = rangey2;
	newNPC.walkingType = WalkingType;
	newNPC.HP = HP;
	newNPC.MaxHP = HP;
	newNPC.MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((HP / 100));
	if (newNPC.MaxHit < 1) {
		newNPC.MaxHit = 1;
	}
	if (newNPC.npcType == 494) {
     	if ((newNPC.absX == 3011) && (newNPC.absY == 3353)) {
        	newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY);
     	}
  	}

	newNPC.heightLevel = heightLevel;
            newNPC.Respawns = Respawns;
	npcs[slot] = newNPC;
}[/code]

still geting a error

Read full topic
